ABOUT US

You will find Marken 26 in the city centre of Bergen, only a short walk from the central train station. The nearest airport is "Bergen, Flesland" Airport, 17 km from Marken. Popular points of interest near the apartment includes KODE Art Museums and Composer Homes, The Leprosy Museum and Bryggen.

The cosy white wooden house which is located in a pedestrian street consists of 2 floors and offers two separate apartments suitable for respectively 1-4 person each apartment.

Every apartment has a living-/sleeping area with a double bed, a sofa bed (1 or 2 person) an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a fridge, stove, coffee machine and a washing machine. There is a flat-screen TV with a chromecast connected and free Wi-Fi.

Private bathroom with a shower. Towels and linen are included.
